history.proof: intros d p a Hpr Hgcd. unfold is_gcd in Hgcd. destruct Hgcd as [Hcd Hdiv]. qsimpl time: 1 use: prime_div_gcd. destruct is_prime_2 as [Hndiv Hrel]. qsimpl time: 1 use: gcd_sym,prime_div_gcd. qsimpl time: 1 use: gcd_sym,prime_div_gcd,gcd_rel_prime. hauto lq: on depth: 3use: gcd_sym, prime_div_gcd, gcd_rel_prime. qsimpl time: 1 use: gcd_sym,prime_div_gcd,gcd_rel_prime. qsimpl time: 1 use: gcd_sym,prime_div_gcd,gcd_rel_prime. qsimpl time: 1 use: gcd_sym,prime_div_gcd,gcd_rel_prime.

ctx: intros d p a Hpr Hgcd.
exceptions.exn: In environment H5 : forall (d a b : nat) (H : is_gcd d a b), (d = 0 -> False) -> rel_prime (quo a d (gcd_div_l d a b H)) (quo b d (gcd_div_r d a b H)) H4 : forall p a : nat, is_prime p -> (divides a p -> False) -> rel_prime p a H : forall d a b : nat, is_gcd d a b -> is_gcd d b a d, x, x0 : nat Hdiv : forall d' : nat, is_cd d' (d * x0) (d * x) -> divides d d' H0 : d * x = 1 -> False H1 : forall d0 : nat, divides (d * x) d0 -> d0 = 1 \\/ d0 = d * x Hndiv : 2 = 1 -> False Hrel : forall d : nat, divides 2 d -> d = 1 \\/ d = 2 Unable to unify "False" with "d = 1".

original: intros d p a Hpr Hgcd. unfold is_gcd in Hgcd. destruct Hgcd as [Hcd Hdiv]. apply prime_div_gcd in Hpr. destruct Hpr as [Hndiv Hrel]. apply gcd_sym in Hcd. apply gcd_rel_prime in Hcd. destruct (Hcd (gcd_div_l d a p Hdiv)). - left. auto. - right. apply Nat.mul_cancel_r with (p := p) in e. + auto. + apply (gcd_non_zero d p a). * apply Hndiv. * auto.
